__e: Strange, for a moment I thought things were back the way they were.
But sometimes, much as it sucks, it takes losing some shit to make room for something new.
Look, if shit pops off, I can't be worrying about you.
And when the felotas hit the fan, he will wipe his hands clean of you.
All these people trying to be like me, and they don't even write about poop consistency the next day.
